message:
i want remote desktop / workstation running Linux im not gone to use it as web server however i want access the GUI using some rdp client and use it for my work coding and stuff like that   i dont know if there are any services like that 
if there recommend one with good prices ?

data.message: it's not typical rdp but I think teamviewer can do the job, it doesn't charge you for personal use

Actually i do not fully understand your request , do you want to rent it ? in this case , go ahead , buy some cheap VPS / Cloud (Centos or Ubuntu) , install GUI (Gnome is the best , keep away from KDE) on it along with vnc-server , and use a VNC viewer client (exist for both windows and linux) to remotely access it . in case you want to install the OS at your own PC/Lap , you may download and install Centos /Ubuntu with GNOME , and as mentioned above , use a VNC viewer client to access it from any other device (even your mobile device) , This may help :
https://uk.godaddy.com/help/set-up-a-linux-desktop-with-gnome-and-vnc-6012
Try c9.io, it gives you a Linux VM with IDE in the browser
just use ssh with your home pc
A Digital Ocean or free 12-months cloud server from AWS, install gnome or XFCE on a ubuntu server image and connect with VNC.
You can mount the remote file system on your local machine using sshfs, then do the coding locally using your preferred IDE.
